summary: Captain Marvel: i test screening elogiano in particolare il gatto Goose
title: Captain Marvel: i test screening elogiano in particolare il gatto Goose
body:
Captain Marvel: i test screening elogiano in particolare il gatto Goose

Secondo le reazioni ai test screening di Captain Marvel, il gatto di Carol Danvers, Goose, ruba il palcoscenico.

Quando Gooseè stato mostrato per la prima volta nel trailer di Captain Marvel poco tempo fa, alcune parti dell’internet si sono concentrate molto di più su quanto fosse carino il gatto che nella resa del trailer in se. Adesso pare che Goose ruberà il palcoscenico alla nostra Carol…

View On WordPress

summary: I think...I would pick me, Mordo, Wong, The Ancient One, Scarlet Witch, Loki, Thor and Carol Danvers. Just in case pure magic...
body:
I think…I would pick me, Mordo, Wong, The Ancient One, Scarlet Witch, Loki, Thor and Carol Danvers. Just in case pure magic didn’t work, Carol would use her cosmic power and Loki would stab. Thor and Wanda would be the strong attackers, Carol would cover them, Loki would be the infiltrator, I would be the strategist, Mordo would be the flexible supporter, Wong would be the defender and the Ancient One would be the expert balanced team member who has all the knowledge we need to apply.

The name? Ahn…the Mystic Protectors…? Magic Boom?

reblog.comment:

I think…I would pick me, Mordo, Wong, The Ancient One, Scarlet Witch, Loki, Thor and Carol Danvers. Just in case pure magic didn’t work, Carol would use her cosmic power and Loki would stab. I think…I would pick me, Mordo, Wong, The Ancient One, Scarlet Witch, Loki, Thor and Carol Danvers. Just in case pure magic didn’t work, Carol would use her cosmic power and Loki would stab. Thor and Wanda would be the strong attackers, Carol would cover them, Loki would be the infiltrator, I would be the strategist, Mordo would be the flexible supporter, Wong would be the defender and the Ancient One would be the expert balanced team member who has all the knowledge we need to apply.

summary:
Y’all liked my last post, that’s so sweet :)
Now imagine Carol Danvers finding Tony Stark in his ship as his oxygen has run out,...
body:
Y’all liked my last post, that’s so sweet :)


Now imagine Carol Danvers finding Tony Stark in his ship as his oxygen has run out, and he’s writhing on the ground just *gasping* for breath when she tries to help. He looks at her and with a strained, final breath, whispers


“I’m not ready to die”

reblog.comment:

title: DC Gallery: Shazam!
body:
A couple weeks back–January 16–I noticed a new statue on a display shelf at Comic Heaven. Captain Marvel! (Well…legally/officially “Shazam” but that’s a whole other post/series of posts).

Anyway…a new DC Gallery statue from Diamond Select!

I’d known this was “coming soon,” but was thinking it was due at the endof the month, January 30 or so. But seeing it in front of me…and having suspected I’d…

View On WordPress
